QUESTION

I am getting scared dreams now a days ? related to my husband?like loosing him forever? like loosing my teeth completly?

1)i want to know whether there are some Duva's for receiting before night? every night i do receite Ayatul kursi and darud before sleep. can you please let me what should i do for having Barkat in my house?i am trying for job from 3 yrs but Allahutala has not blessed me until now , can you tell me what i have to do?i am in USA , i want to go to my homeland but i am scared about my inlaws? they believe in black magic? to be away from sorts of missdeed what should i do? what should i do to be away from Nazar

ANSWER

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

The following dua should be read after experiencing a nightmare:

أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّةِ مِنْ غَضَبِهِ وَشَرِّ عِبَادِهِ وَمِنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّيَاطِينِ وَأَنْ يَحْضُرُونِ

I invoke the perfect words of Allah for protection against His warth, anger, and punishment and the mischief of His servants and the evil promtings of the Shaytans and against their coning even near me. (Abu Dawud, Al-Tirmidhi)

When retiring to bed, recite the last three surahs of the Quran along with Ayat al-Kursi and blow on your hands and pass the hands over the entire body.

For barakah in your income and to be relieved from financial difficulties recite the following dua:

اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِى بِحَلاَلِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ وَأَغْنِنِى بِفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ

O Allah, provide me with lawful livelihood, adequate to my needs instead of unlawful one, and graciously grant me freedom from needing anything from anyone besides Yourself. (Al-Tirmidhi, Ahmad)

اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّى أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا وَعَمَلاً مُتَقَبَّلاً

O Allah, I ask from you useful knowledge, pure sustenance, and accepted actions.

قُلِ اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِى وَارْحَمْنِى وَاهْدِنِى وَارْزُقْنِى

O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, and provide me with sustenance.

Also recite Surah al-Waqi’a at night.

To safeguard once self from black magic recite the last two continuously recite the last two surahs of the Quran and Ayat al-Kursi.  One may also recite the following dua for protection against Jinns:

أعوذ بوجه الله الكريم وكلماته التامات التي لا يجاوزهن بر ولا فاجر من شر ما ينزل من السماء وما يعرج فيها ومن شر ما ذرأ في الارض وما يخرج منها ومن فتن الليل والنهار ومن شر طوارق الليل والنهار إلا طارقا يطرق بخير يا رحمن

I seek protection in the countenance of Allah and I seek protection in his perfect words which cannot be escaped by any good or evil person from the mischief of what descends from the skies and ascends therein and from the mischief of what is scattered on the earth and what issues therefrom and from the mischief of the night and day and from the mischief of every calamity befalling in the night and day except that happening which brings goodness and blessings, O Most Merciful.

When afflicted with nazr, say the following words:

 ببسم الله اللهم أذهب حرها ووصبها

In the name of Allah, O Allah remove its (the nazr’s) heat, its cold and its pain.

Then recite:

قم باذن الله

Stand by order of Allah

And Allah knows best

Wassalam
